Welcome to Our Enhanced Campus Security Surveillance System

Ensuring safety and security for all members of our campus community.

Our Campus Security Surveillance System is designed to:

  • Monitor and deter unauthorized access to campus facilities.
  • Provide real-time surveillance to prevent and address security threats.
  • Assist in emergency response and evacuation procedures.
  • Facilitate investigations into incidents and complaints.

We prioritize the safety and well-being of everyone on campus, and our surveillance system plays a crucial role in achieving this goal.
